title: A systematic literature review on solution approaches for the index tracking problem in the last decade. (arXiv:2306.01660v1 [q-fin.PM])
abstract: The passive management approach offers conservative investors a way to reduce risk concerning the market. This investment strategy aims at replicating a specific index, such as the NASDAQ Composite or the FTSE100 index. The problem is that buying all the index's assets incurs high rebalancing costs, and this harms future returns. The index tracking problem concerns building a portfolio that follows a specific benchmark with fewer transaction costs. Since a subset of assets is required to solve the index problem this class of problems is NP-hard, and in the past years, researchers have been studying solution approaches to obtain tracking portfolios more practically. This work brings an analysis, spanning the last decade, of the advances in mathematical approaches for index tracking. The systematic literature review covered important issues, such as the most relevant research areas, solution methods, and model structures. translated_title: 过去十年指数跟踪问题的解决方法的系统文献综述
translated_abstract: 被动管理方法为保守投资者提供了一种降低市场风险的方式。这种投资策略旨在复制特定的指数，如纳斯达克综合指数或富时100指数。问题是购买所有指数资产会产生高昂的再平衡成本，这会损害未来的回报。指数跟踪问题涉及构建一个跟踪特定基准的组合，其交易成本较低。由于需要一个资产子集来解决指数问题，因此这类问题是NP难的，近年来，研究人员一直在研究解决方案以更加实际地获得跟踪组合。本研究对过去十年中数学方法在指数跟踪中的进展进行了全面的分析。系统文献综述涵盖了一些重要问题，例如最相关的研究领域，解决方法和模型结构。特别关注了元分析的探索和分析。
tldr: 本文系统总结了过去十年数学方法在指数跟踪中的进展，旨在找到更实际的解决方案，以构建一个跟踪特定指数的组合，其交易成本降低，同时涵盖了重要问题，例如最相关的研究领域，解决方法和模型结构。
en_tdlr: This article provides a systematic review of the mathematical methods used to solve the index tracking problem over the last decade, with the goal of finding practical solutions for building a portfolio that tracks a specific index with lower transaction costs. The review covers important topics, such as relevant research areas, solution methods, and model structures, with particular attention to meta-analyses.
